computedFields.name: Outcome_Code
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when substr('Issues__c', 1, 1) in ["#"] then case when upper(substr('Issues__c', 2, 2)) in ["LI"] then "Likely" when upper(substr('Issues__c', 4, 2)) in ["LI"] then "Likely" when upper(substr('Issues__c', 2, 2)) in ["VL"] then "Very Likely" when upper(substr('Issues__c', 4, 2)) in ["VL"] then "Very Likely" when upper(substr('Issues__c', 2, 2)) in ["UN"] then "Unlikely" when upper(substr('Issues__c', 4, 2)) in ["UN"] then "Unlikely" when upper(substr('Issues__c', 2, 2)) in ["VU"] then "Very Unlikely" when upper(substr('Issues__c', 4, 2)) in ["VU"] then "Very Unlikely" when upper(substr('Issues__c', 2, 2)) in ["NV"] then "No View" when upper(substr('Issues__c', 4, 2)) in ["NV"] then "No View" else "-NONE-" end else "-BLANK-" end

computedFields.name: Scorecard_Code
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when substr('Issues__c', 1, 1) in ["#"] then case when upper(substr('Issues__c', 2, 2)) in ["SX"] then "Excluded" when upper(substr('Issues__c', 4, 2)) in ["SX"] then "Excluded" when upper(substr('Issues__c', 2, 2)) in ["SU"] then "Suspended" when upper(substr('Issues__c', 4, 2)) in ["SU"] then "Suspended" else "-NONE-" end else "-BLANK-" end

computedFields.name: SEManager_Comments
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when index_of('Issues__c',"!")  !=0 then case when index_of('Issues__c',"!",index_of('Issues__c',"!", index_of('Issues__c',"!")) + 1) !=0 then substr('Issues__c',index_of('Issues__c',"!") + 1, index_of('Issues__c',"!",index_of('Issues__c',"!", index_of('Issues__c',"!") + 1)) - (index_of('Issues__c',"!") + 1)) else "-NO COMMENT-" end else "-NO COMMENT-" end

computedFields.name: Stage2_Flag_Set
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'Stage_2_Flag__c' is null then 0 else 1 end

computedFields.name: ACV_Lost
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'StageName' in ["Dead - Lost"] then 'Amount' else 0 end

computedFields.name: IsLost
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'StageName' in ["Dead - Lost"] then "true" else "false" end

computedFields.name: IsLost_Measure
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'StageName' in ["Dead - Lost"] then 1 else 0 end

computedFields.name: ACV_Dead
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when ('IsWon' == "false" && 'IsClosed' == "true" && !('StageName' matches "Duplicate") && 'StageName' != "Dead - Lost")  then 'Amount' else 0 end

computedFields.name: IsDead
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when ('IsWon' == "false" && 'IsClosed' == "true" && !('StageName' matches "Duplicate") && 'StageName' != "Dead - Lost") then "true" else "false" end

computedFields.name: IsDead_Measure
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when ('IsWon' == "false" && 'IsClosed' == "true" && !('StageName' matches "Duplicate") && 'StageName' != "Dead - Lost") then 1 else 0 end

computedFields.name: Stage_Status
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'IsClosed' == "false" && 'ForecastCategory' != "Omitted" then "Pipeline" when 'IsWon' == "true" then "Won" when 'StageName' in ["Dead - Lost"] then "Lost" when ('IsWon' == "false" && 'IsClosed' == "true" && !('StageName' matches "Duplicate") && 'StageName' != "Dead - Lost")  then "Dead" else "Ommit" end

computedFields.name: Object
computedFields.saqlExpression: (case when 'Opportunity__c' !="-BLANK-" then "Opportunity" when 'Account__c'  !="-BLANK-" then "Account"  when 'Company__c'  !="-BLANK-" then "Company" else "Other" end)

expression.saqlExpression: case when current('Opportunity__c') == previous('Opportunity__c') then 1 else 0 end

computedFields.name: IsDuplicate
computedFields.description: IsDuplicate
computedFields.label: IsDuplicate

expression.saqlExpression: case when current('UniqueId') == previous('UniqueId') then "false" else "true" end

computedFields.name: MostRecent
computedFields.description: Most recent Scorecard for given Type
computedFields.label: MostRecent

expression.saqlExpression: case when current('OpportunityId') == previous('OpportunityId') then "false" else "true" end

computedFields.name: MostRecent
computedFields.description: Most Recent OpportunityFieldHistory
computedFields.label: MostRecent

expression.saqlExpression: case when 'IsScorecard' =="True" then previous('OpportunityStage') else 'StageName' end

computedFields.name: OpportunityStage
computedFields.description: Opportunity Stage when Scorecard was created
computedFields.label: OpportunityStage

expression.saqlExpression: case when 'IsScorecard' =="True" then previous('OpportunityForecastCategory') else 'ForecastCategory' end

computedFields.name: OpportunityForecastCategory
computedFields.description: Opportunity OpportunityForecastCategory when Scorecard was created
computedFields.label: OpportunityForecastCategory

expression.saqlExpression: case when 'IsScorecard' =="True" then previous('OpportunityAmount') else 'Amount' end

computedFields.name: OpportunityAmount
computedFields.description: Opportunity Amount when Scorecard was created
computedFields.label: OpportunityAmount

expression.saqlExpression: case when 'IsScorecard' =="True" then previous('OpportunityCloseDate') else toDate(CloseDate_Month + "/" + CloseDate_Day + "/" + CloseDate_Year, "MM/dd/yyyy") end

computedFields.name: OpportunityCloseDate
computedFields.description: Opportunity Close Date when Scorecard was created
computedFields.label: OpportunityCloseDate

computedFields.name: Tenure_Band
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'Tenure__c' <90 then "01. 0-3 Months" when ('Tenure__c' >=90 and 'Tenure__c' <=180) then "02. 3-6 Months" when ('Tenure__c' >180 and 'Tenure__c' <=365) then "03. 6-12 Months" when ('Tenure__c' >365 and 'Tenure__c' <=730) then "04. 1-2 Years" when ('Tenure__c' >730 and 'Tenure__c' <=1825) then "05. 2-5 Years" when ('Tenure__c' >1825 and 'Tenure__c' <=3650) then "06. 5-10 Years" when ('Tenure__c' >3650 and 'Tenure__c' <=5475) then "07. 10-15 Years" when ('Tenure__c' >5475 and 'Tenure__c' <=7300) then "08. 15-20 Years" else "99. 20+ Years" end
computedFields.label: Tenure (Band)

expression.saqlExpression: (current(Amount) - previous(Amount))

computedFields.name: AmountChange
computedFields.description: Change from previous amount
computedFields.label: Amount Change

expression.saqlExpression: (current(Amount) - previous(Amount))/previous(Amount)*100

computedFields.name: AmountChange_pct
computedFields.description: Percentage change from previous amount
computedFields.label: Amount Change (%)

expression.saqlExpression: daysBetween(toDate(previous(CloseDate_Month) + "/" + previous(CloseDate_Day) + "/" + previous(CloseDate_Year), "M/d/yyyy"), toDate(current(CloseDate_Month) + "/" + current(CloseDate_Day) + "/" + current(CloseDate_Year), "M/d/yyyy"))

computedFields.name: CloseDateChange
computedFields.description: Change in days from Close Date
computedFields.label: Close Date Change

computedFields.name: ComboCompanyId
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when coalesce(len('Global_Company__c'),0) == 18 then 'Global_Company__c' when coalesce(len('Locked_Company__c'),0) == 18 then 'Locked_Company__c' else 'Id' end

computedFields.name: FutureComboCompanyId
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when coalesce(len('Global_Company__c'),0) == 18 then 'Global_Company__c' when coalesce(len('Company__c'),0) == 18 then 'Company__c' else 'Id' end

computedFields.name: Object
computedFields.saqlExpression: (case when 'DSR__c'  is not null then "DSR" when 'Opportunity__c' is not null then "Opportunity" when 'Account__c' is not null then "Account" when 'Company__c' is not null then "Company" else "-BLANK-" end)

computedFields.name: ObjectId
computedFields.saqlExpression: (case when 'DSR__c'  is not null then 'DSR__c' when 'Opportunity__c' is not null then 'Opportunity__c' when  'Account__c' is not null then 'Account__c' when 'Company__c' is not null then 'Company__c' else "-BLANK-" end)

computedFields.name: Weighted_Value_Colour
computedFields.saqlExpression: (case when 'Weighted_Value__c'  <= 'Type.Red_Score__c' then "#B50E03" when 'Weighted_Value__c'  >= 'Type.Green_Score__c' then "#00B531" else "#B56200" end)

computedFields.name: NonZeroExclusion_Weighted_Value_Colour
computedFields.saqlExpression: (case when 'Non_Zero_Exclusion_Average_Value__c'  <= 'Type.Red_Score__c' then "#B50E03" when 'Non_Zero_Exclusion_Average_Value__c'  >= 'Type.Green_Score__c' then "#00B531" else "#B56200" end)

computedFields.name: NonZero_Weighted_Value_Colour
computedFields.saqlExpression: (case when 'Average_Value__c'  <= 'Type.Red_Score__c' then "#B50E03" when 'Average_Value__c'  >= 'Type.Green_Score__c' then "#00B531" else "#B56200" end)

computedFields.name: Group
computedFields.saqlExpression: (case when 'Description' matches "ANZ " then "ANZ Programs" when 'Description'  matches "APAC India " then "India Programs"  when 'Description'  matches "EMEA North " then "EMEA North Programs" when 'Description' matches "Central Europe " then "EMEA Central Programs" when 'Description' matches "EMEA South " then "EMEA South Programs" when 'Description' matches "UKI " then "UKI Programs" when 'Description' matches "Global ECP" then "Global ECP Programs" when 'Description' in ["Global Advisory Board","Global Team Alex"] then "BVS Programs" when 'Description' in ["Global Strategic Customer Program"] then "Global Strategic Customer Program"  when 'Description' matches "PE " then "Private Equity Programs" else "Other" end)

expression.saqlExpression: case when current('OpportunityId') == previous('OpportunityId') then "false" else "true" end

computedFields.name: MostRecent
computedFields.description: Most Recent OpportunityFieldHistory
computedFields.label: MostRecent

expression.saqlExpression: case when 'IsDSR' =="True" then previous('OpportunityStage') else 'StageName' end

computedFields.name: OpportunityStage
computedFields.description: Opportunity Stage when DSR was created
computedFields.label: OpportunityStage

expression.saqlExpression: case when 'IsDSR' =="True" then previous('OpportunityForecastCategory') else 'ForecastCategory' end

computedFields.name: OpportunityForecastCategory
computedFields.description: Opportunity Forecast Category when DSR was created
computedFields.label: OpportunityForecastCategory

expression.saqlExpression: case when 'IsDSR' =="True" then previous('OpportunityAmount') else 'Amount' end

computedFields.name: OpportunityAmount
computedFields.description: Opportunity Amount when Event was created
computedFields.label: OpportunityAmount

expression.saqlExpression: case when 'IsDSR' =="True" then previous('OpportunityCloseDate') else toDate(CloseDate_Month + "/" + CloseDate_Day + "/" + CloseDate_Year, "MM/dd/yyyy") end

computedFields.name: OpportunityCloseDate
computedFields.description: Opportunity Close Date when Event was created
computedFields.label: OpportunityCloseDate

computedFields.name: Opportunity_Age_c
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'IsClosed' == "true" then daysBetween(toDate('CreatedDate_Month' + "/" + 'CreatedDate_Day' + "/" + 'CreatedDate_Year', "M/d/yyyy"), toDate('CloseDate_Month' + "/" + 'CloseDate_Day' + "/" + 'CloseDate_Year', "M/d/yyyy")) else daysBetween(toDate('CreatedDate_Month' + "/" + 'CreatedDate_Day' + "/" + 'CreatedDate_Year', "M/d/yyyy"), now()) end
computedFields.label: Opportunity_Age_c

computedFields.name: SalesCycleInDays
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'IsClosed' == "true" then daysBetween(toDate('CreatedDate_Month' + "/" + 'CreatedDate_Day' + "/" + 'CreatedDate_Year', "M/d/yyyy"), toDate('CloseDate_Month' + "/" + 'CloseDate_Day' + "/" + 'CloseDate_Year', "M/d/yyyy")) else 0 end
computedFields.label: SalesCycleInDays

computedFields.name: Opportunity_Age
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'IsClosed' == "true" then daysBetween(toDate('CreatedDate_Month' + "/" + 'CreatedDate_Day' + "/" + 'CreatedDate_Year', "M/d/yyyy"), toDate('CloseDate_Month' + "/" + 'CloseDate_Day' + "/" + 'CloseDate_Year', "M/d/yyyy")) else daysBetween(toDate('CreatedDate_Month' + "/" + 'CreatedDate_Day' + "/" + 'CreatedDate_Year', "M/d/yyyy"), now()) end
computedFields.label: Opportunity_Age

computedFields.name: ACV_Band
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when ('Amount' >0 and 'Amount' <=10000) then "01. 0-10k" when ('Amount' >10000 and 'Amount' <=20000) then "02. 10-20k" when ('Amount' >20000 and 'Amount' <=50000) then "03. 20-50k" when ('Amount' >50000 and 'Amount' <=100000) then "04. 50-100k" when ('Amount' >50000 and 'Amount' <=150000) then "05. 100-150k" when ('Amount' >150000 and 'Amount' <=200000) then "06. 150-200k" when ('Amount' >200000 and 'Amount' <=250000) then "07. 200-250k" when ('Amount' >250000 and 'Amount' <=500000) then "08. 250-500k" when ('Amount' >500000 and 'Amount' <=1000000) then "09. 500k-1M" when ('Amount' >1000000 and 'Amount' <=2000000) then "10. 1-2M" when ('Amount' >2000000 and 'Amount' <=5000000) then "11. 2-5M" when ('Amount' >5000000 and 'Amount' <=10000000) then "12. 5-10M" when ('Amount' >10000000) then "99. >10M" else "00. <=0" end

computedFields.name: ACV_Band_2
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when ('Amount' >0 and 'Amount' <150000) then "01. 0-150k" when ('Amount' >=150000 and 'Amount' <=500000) then "02. 150-500k" when ('Amount' >=500000) then "03. >500k" else "00. <=0" end

computedFields.name: ACV_Band
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'Amount' <=0 then "00. <=0" when ('Amount' >0 and 'Amount' <=10000) then "01. 0-10k" when ('Amount' >10000 and 'Amount' <=20000) then "02. 10-20k" when ('Amount' >20000 and 'Amount' <=50000) then "03. 20-50k" when ('Amount' >50000 and 'Amount' <=100000) then "04. 50-100k" when ('Amount' >50000 and 'Amount' <=150000) then "05. 100-150k" when ('Amount' >150000 and 'Amount' <=200000) then "06. 150-200k" when ('Amount' >200000 and 'Amount' <=250000) then "07. 200-250k" when ('Amount' >250000 and 'Amount' <=500000) then "08. 250-500k" when ('Amount' >500000 and 'Amount' <=1000000) then "09. 500k-1M" when ('Amount' >1000000 and 'Amount' <=2000000) then "10. 1-2M" when ('Amount' >2000000 and 'Amount' <=5000000) then "11. 2-5M" when ('Amount' >5000000 and 'Amount' <=10000000) then "12. 5-10M" else "99. >10M" end

computedFields.name: ACV_Band_2
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'Amount' <=0 then "00. <=0" when ('Amount' >0 and 'Amount' <150000) then "01. 0-150k" when ('Amount' >=100000 and 'Amount' <=500000) then "02. 100-500k"  else "03. >500k" end

expression.saqlExpression: case when current('OpportunityId') == previous('OpportunityId') then "false" else "true" end

computedFields.name: MostRecent
computedFields.description: Most Recent OpportunityFieldHistory
computedFields.label: MostRecent

computedFields.name: Value_Colour
computedFields.saqlExpression: (case when 'Value__c'  <= 'Scorecard.Type.Red_Score__c' then "#B50E03" when 'Value__c'  >= 'Scorecard.Type.Green_Score__c' then "#00B531" else "#B56200" end)

expression.saqlExpression: case when 'IsInfluencedDSR' =="True" then previous('OpportunityStage') else 'StageName' end

computedFields.name: OpportunityStage
computedFields.description: Opportunity Stage when DSR was created
computedFields.label: OpportunityStage

expression.saqlExpression: case when 'IsInfluencedDSR' =="True" then previous('OpportunityForecastCategory') else 'ForecastCategory' end

computedFields.name: OpportunityForecastCategory
computedFields.description: Opportunity ForecastCategory when DSR was created
computedFields.label: OpportunityForecastCategory

expression.saqlExpression: case when 'IsInfluencedDSR' =="True" then previous('OpportunityAmount') else 'Amount' end

computedFields.name: OpportunityAmount
computedFields.description: Opportunity Amount when DSR was created
computedFields.label: OpportunityAmount

expression.saqlExpression: case when 'IsInfluencedDSR' =="True" then previous('OpportunityCloseDate') else toDate(CloseDate_Month + "/" + CloseDate_Day + "/" + CloseDate_Year, "MM/dd/yyyy") end

computedFields.name: OpportunityCloseDate
computedFields.description: Opportunity Close Date when DSR was created
computedFields.label: OpportunityCloseDate
